text: is a 2006 Japanese American World War II drama movie directed by Clint Eastwood and was based on the novel by Tadamichi Kuribayashi. It stars Ken Watanabe, Mark Moses, Roxanne Hart, Luke Eberl, Jeremy Glazer, Yuki Matsuzaki, Eijiro Ozaki, Ryō Kase, Shidō Nakamura, Tsuyoshi Ihara and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It won an Academy Award and was nominated for 3 others in 2007. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set on islands Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies
title: Letters from Iwo Jima
